DOC.HEADLINE: STUDY OF SEX LIVES
DOC.TEXT: Re the survey on American ' s sexual practices ( Oct . 7 ) : Am I the only one who realizes that its impossible for men to have more sex partners ( on average ) than women do ? I mean , if women only have two sex partners , and men have six , where do the extra four wome come from ? Somebody ' s not telling the whole truth here . ROBERT WITTMOND Lakewood
